title: Upgraded internet by over 100mbps and my ping didn't change at all?
body: I'm on Xfinity and I live in Alabama. Yes I'm using a wired connection. But I've even got a new modem from Xfinity. Nothing is changing. It all started about a month ago now. I had around 20-25mbps download and got 39ms and all of a sudden one day that just jumped up to 65ms. So I decided to upgrade my internet. I got around 75mbps and nothing changed. So I had a technician come out and check it out he said everything was good on my end and on their end so I have no idea what the problem could be. And then I upgraded after that which turned out to be cheaper anyway so now I get like 120mbps and I get even higher ping now. I'm sitting at a constant 75/80ms. I don't know what else to try. I want my old ping back :'[

replies.body:
Rusko, it's really a bummer that you're still going through this hassle.  I'm really sorry about that.  :(  Let's get some logs and have our tech team take a deeper look, maybe we can find some more options for you.  

Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get these logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll get back to you as soon as we can, hang in there!
